process.name: Test Queue Transactions
process.narrative: Test to ensure that the queue transactions are being recorded and reported correctly

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to run

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to be created

input.name: Key Field
input.narrative: The key column to use in the collection which makes up a queue item

input.name: Max Attempts
input.narrative: The maximum number of retry attempts for the queue. Default: 5

output.name: Success
output.narrative: Whether the create call was successful or not

output.name: Subprocess Output
output.narrative: The output from the automatec "create queue" process

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to be created

input.name: Key Field
input.narrative: The key column to use in the collection which makes up a queue item

input.name: Max Attempts
input.narrative: The maximum number of retry attempts for the queue. Default: 5

output.name: Success
output.narrative: Whether the create call was successful or not

output.name: Subprocess Output
output.narrative: The output from the automatec "create queue" process

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to add items to

input.name: Data
input.narrative: A collection containing the data, one row for each item to be added

input.name: Defer Until
input.narrative: Optionally, the date/time the new item(s) should be deferred until

input.name: Priority
input.narrative: Optionally, the priority for the new item(s). Lower numbers represent higher priorities. The default is 0.

input.name: Tags
input.narrative: Optionally, a semi-colon-separated set of tags to apply to the queue item(s)

input.name: Status
input.narrative: Optionally, the initial status required of the work queue item(s)

output.name: Item IDs
output.narrative: The IDs of the items which have been added to the queue, in the order of the collection of data passed that was input

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to add items to

input.name: Data
input.narrative: A collection containing the data, one row for each item to be added

input.name: Defer Until
input.narrative: Optionally, the date/time the new item(s) should be deferred until

input.name: Priority
input.narrative: Optionally, the priority for the new item(s). Lower numbers represent higher priorities. The default is 0.

input.name: Tags
input.narrative: Optionally, a semi-colon-separated set of tags to apply to the queue item(s)

input.name: Status
input.narrative: Optionally, the initial status required of the work queue item(s)

output.name: Item IDs
output.narrative: The IDs of the items which have been added to the queue, in the order of the collection of data passed that was input

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to run

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to add items to

input.name: Key Filter
input.narrative: Optionally, a key value to filter by. Only items with this key value will be considered.

input.name: Tag Filter
input.narrative: Optionally, a tag mask to filter by. The tag should be in the format : ."+wanted tag; -unwanted tag ; other wanted tag".

output.name: Item ID
output.narrative: The ID of the item retrieved - empty if there are none available.

output.name: Data
output.narrative: The data associated with the item - a single collection row.

output.name: Status
output.narrative: The status of the item.

output.name: Attempts
output.narrative: The number of attempts already made to work this item.

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection whose rows are to be counted

output.name: Count
output.narrative: The number of rows counted in the collection

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection whose rows are to be counted

output.name: Count
output.narrative: The number of rows counted in the collection

input.name: Item ID
input.narrative: The ID of the item to defer

input.name: Until
input.narrative: When to resume processing the case

input.name: Item ID
input.narrative: The ID of the item to mark

input.name: Exception Reason
input.narrative: A description of the reason for the exception

input.name: Retry
input.narrative: Whether or not to retry the item, up to the maximum number of attempts specified for the queue. Optional - if not specified, the item will be retried

input.name: Keep Locked
input.narrative: Whether or not the clone of the item should remain locked after the exception has been registered and the item is retried. Optional - default is False

output.name: New Item ID
output.narrative: The Item ID of the newly cloned item. This item will be locked if 'Keep Locked' is True. This will be empty if no item was cloned (ie. the item was not retried.

input.name: Item ID
input.narrative: The ID of the item to mark

input.name: Exception Reason
input.narrative: A description of the reason for the exception

input.name: Retry
input.narrative: Whether or not to retry the item, up to the maximum number of attempts specified for the queue. Optional - if not specified, the item will be retried

input.name: Keep Locked
input.narrative: Whether or not the clone of the item should remain locked after the exception has been registered and the item is retried. Optional - default is False

output.name: New Item ID
output.narrative: The Item ID of the newly cloned item. This item will be locked if 'Keep Locked' is True. This will be empty if no item was cloned (ie. the item was not retried.

input.name: Item ID
input.narrative: The ID of the item to mark

input.name: Queues
input.narrative: The queues to get the counts for

input.name: Start Date
input.narrative: The start date for the report

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection to be modified

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection to be modified

input.name: Queues
input.narrative: The queues to get the counts for

input.name: Start Date
input.narrative: The start date for the report

input.name: Start Date/Time
input.narrative: The UTC date/time from which activity counts should be retrieved. This is inclusive

input.name: End Date/Time
input.narrative: The UTC date/time up to and including which activity counts should be retrieved. This is inclusive. If empty, this will take all activity counts up until now.

input.name: Count item creations
input.narrative: True to count the work queue items being created - default is False

input.name: Count item locks
input.narrative: True to count the work queue items being locked - default is False

input.name: Count item deferrals
input.narrative: True to count the work queue items being deferred - default is False

input.name: Count item completions
input.narrative: True to count the work queue items being completed successfully - default is False

input.name: Count item exceptions with automatic retry
input.narrative: True to count the work queue items being marked with an exception and automatically retried - default is False

input.name: Count item exceptions without automatic retry
input.narrative: True to count the work queue items being marked with an exception and without an automatic retry being create - default is False

input.name: Count item deletions
input.narrative: True to count the work queue items being deleted - default is False

input.name: Count item forced retries
input.narrative: True to count the work queue items which were force retried - ie. they had been marked with an exception with no automatic retry, and had later been manually retried

input.name: Excluded Queue Names
input.narrative: The names of the queues to retrieve the activity counts for. The names should be in a column within the collection named 'Queue Name'. If any queue names do not match a queue on the system, they are ignored.

output.name: Created
output.narrative: The number of item creations counted, zero if they were not counted

output.name: Locked
output.narrative: The number of item locks counted, zero if they were not counted

output.name: Deferred
output.narrative: The number of defferals counted, zero if they were not counted

output.name: Completed
output.narrative: The number of item completions counted, zero if they were not counted

output.name: Exceptions with retry
output.narrative: The number of item exceptions with automatic retry counted, zero if they were not counted

output.name: Exceptions with no retry
output.narrative: The number of item exceptions without automatic retry counted, zero if they were not counted

output.name: Deletions
output.narrative: The number of item deletions counted, zero if they were not counted

output.name: Force Retries
output.narrative: The number of item forced retries counted, zero if they were not counted

output.name: Total Count
output.narrative: The total number queue item operations counted

output.name: Included Queues
output.narrative: The queues that were included in the report. Contains a single text column called 'Queue Name'.

stage.name: Return values from Get Transaction Data

calculation.expression: [Expected Exceptioned with retry] + [Input Queues.Exceptioned with retry]
[Expected Exceptioned without retry] + [Input Queues.Exceptioned without retry]

[Expected Total] + [Input Queues.Locked] + [Input Queues.Force retried] + [Input Queues.Exceptioned without retry] + [Input Queues.Exceptioned with retry] + [Input Queues.Deleted] + [Input Queues.Deferred] + [Input Queues.Created] + [Input Queues.Completed]

decision.expression: [Expected Exceptioned without retry] = [Exceptions with no retry]

exception.detail: "Created count differs for queues : " & [Queue Names Text] & " Expected: " & [Expected Created] & "; Report returned: " & [Created]
"Locked count differs for queues : " & [Queue Names Text] & " Expected: " & [Expected Locked] & "; Report returned: " & [Locked]
"Deferred count differs for queues : " & [Queue Names Text] & " Expected: " & [Expected Deferred] & "; Report returned: " & [Deferred]
"Completed count differs for queues : " & [Queue Names Text] & " Expected: " & [Expected Completed] & "; Report returned: " & [Completed]
"Retried Exception count differs for queues : " & [Queue Names Text] & " Expected: " & [Expected Exceptioned with retry] & "; Report returned: " & [Exceptions with retry]
"Final Exception count differs for queues : " & [Queue Names Text] & " Expected: " & [Expected Exceptioned without retry] & "; Report returned: " & [Exceptions with no retry]
"Total count differs for queues : " & [Queue Names Text] & " Expected: " & [Expected Total] & "; Report returned: " & [Total Count]

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative: First run each queue independently, deleting the generated input queue row each time through the loop

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection to be modified

input.name: Queues
input.narrative: The queues to get the counts for

input.name: Start Date
input.narrative: The start date for the report

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection to be modified

stage.name: Note2
stage.narrative: Then run on all at once

input.name: Queues
input.narrative: The queues to get the counts for

input.name: Start Date
input.narrative: The start date for the report

input.name: Queues
input.narrative: The queues to get the counts for

input.name: Start Date
input.narrative: The start date for the report

input.name: Start Date/Time
input.narrative: The UTC date/time from which activity counts should be retrieved. This is inclusive

input.name: End Date/Time
input.narrative: The UTC date/time up to and including which activity counts should be retrieved. This is inclusive. If empty, this will take all activity counts up until now.

input.name: Count item creations
input.narrative: True to count the work queue items being created - default is False

input.name: Count item locks
input.narrative: True to count the work queue items being locked - default is False

input.name: Count item deferrals
input.narrative: True to count the work queue items being deferred - default is False

input.name: Count item completions
input.narrative: True to count the work queue items being completed successfully - default is False

input.name: Count item exceptions with automatic retry
input.narrative: True to count the work queue items being marked with an exception and automatically retried - default is False

input.name: Count item exceptions without automatic retry
input.narrative: True to count the work queue items being marked with an exception and without an automatic retry being create - default is False

input.name: Count item deletions
input.narrative: True to count the work queue items being deleted - default is False

input.name: Count item forced retries
input.narrative: True to count the work queue items which were force retried - ie. they had been marked with an exception with no automatic retry, and had later been manually retried

input.name: Excluded Queue Names
input.narrative: The names of the queues to retrieve the activity counts for. The names should be in a column within the collection named 'Queue Name'. If any queue names do not match a queue on the system, they are ignored.

output.name: Created
output.narrative: The number of item creations counted, zero if they were not counted

output.name: Locked
output.narrative: The number of item locks counted, zero if they were not counted

output.name: Deferred
output.narrative: The number of defferals counted, zero if they were not counted

output.name: Completed
output.narrative: The number of item completions counted, zero if they were not counted

output.name: Exceptions with retry
output.narrative: The number of item exceptions with automatic retry counted, zero if they were not counted

output.name: Exceptions with no retry
output.narrative: The number of item exceptions without automatic retry counted, zero if they were not counted

output.name: Deletions
output.narrative: The number of item deletions counted, zero if they were not counted

output.name: Force Retries
output.narrative: The number of item forced retries counted, zero if they were not counted

output.name: Total Count
output.narrative: The total number queue item operations counted

output.name: Included Queues
output.narrative: The queues that were included in the report. Contains a single text column called 'Queue Name'.

exception.detail: "Expected zero created transactions for queues : " & [Queue Names Text] & " Report returned: " & [Created]
"Expected zero locked transactions for queues : " & [Queue Names Text] & " Report returned: " & [Locked]
"Expected zero deferred transactions count for queues : " & [Queue Names Text] & " Report returned: " & [Deferred]
"Expected zero completed transactions count for queues : " & [Queue Names Text] & " Report returned: " & [Completed]
"Expected zero retried exception transactions count for queues : " & [Queue Names Text] & " Report returned: " & [Exceptions with retry]
"Expected zero final exception transactions count for queues : " & [Queue Names Text] & " Report returned: " & [Exceptions with no retry]
"Expected zero total transactions count for queues : " & [Queue Names Text] & " Report returned: " & [Total Count]

stage.name: Note5
stage.narrative: Test that *not* including counts correctly returns zero. Have some as blank, and some as "False" - see bug 5072

input.name: Queues
input.narrative: The queues to exclude from the list of queues in the system.

output.name: Queue Names
output.narrative: The names of all the queues in the system except those specified

output.name: Queue Names
output.narrative: The names of the queues found within the current environment. Contains a single text column 'Queue Name'.

input.name: Queues
input.narrative: The queues to exclude from the list of queues in the system.

output.name: Queue Names
output.narrative: The names of all the queues in the system except those specified

stage.name: Note6
stage.narrative: Remove any queues which were specified in the inputs

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection to be modified

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to delete

input.name: Seconds
input.narrative: The number of seconds to wait (can be fractional)
